mainText:
God blessing you. 
It must be great honor for me to live with you & this generation which you create. 
Your way how to think is the ecstasy property to the world and its world will miss you forever. 
Tears will be kept on next some days, but I will soon be on usual and iPhone will make much more fun & convenient for my life.
Thanks, Steve and now you can take peaceful sleep. 
Enjoy your sleep!
author: CY
